response.original_title: Waves of Immigrants: The Asian American Journey
response.overview: Watch this and be enlightened about the situation in the United States and how the prolific advances in immigration can and will help citizens today and escape the past. In a film with historical accuracy, a moving picture identifying misteps along the way and a promise for a better tommorrow as advances in social science continues.
response.title: Waves of Immigrants: The Asian American Journey
